summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3529 for the improvement of Woodrow Place, as established in Block 6, McGilvra's 2nd Addition, from East Madison Street to East Galer Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43626, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
